features: 【 Unique & Vintage Bookshelf 】The bookshelf is of Tree-shaped geometry structure. Roomy, Practical, Decorative Bookcase for display. It's a great space-saving bookshelf and helps to keep your room neat and clutter-free. Dimension: 33.9’’(L)*9.8’’(W)*55.1’’(H)

【13 Compartments Storage & Space-Saving】 Features 13 open shelving spaces, this bookshelf provides ample space for placing and organizing your books, plants, collections and knick-knacks. Perfect for accessorizing, organize, and store your items while keeping them tidy and organized at home office

【Multiple Usage & Fit For Various Space】With an attractive vintage appearance and functional design, perfect platforms for displaying your decorations. This storage shelf can be used as a bookcase, storage shelves, Display shelf, storage organizer and even can be a partition of porch or sofa, beautiful and provide more private space. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, kitchen, balcony, office, corridor or any other space. To beautify your room and make your place more personal

【High-Quality Selected Wood Bookshelf & Anti-Falling 】Make of high-quality P2 MDF Board with high glossy finish veneer. Not only provides great stability and durability, but also offers you a safe, healthy and large storage space in your home bedroom. And the anti-falling accessory included preventing injury from unexpected tipping of furniture

【Worry-free Assembly & Excellent After-sales Services】 All necessary hardware & tools included and all labeled parts, easy to assemble in 30 mins. And the professional customer service will always be there no matter before or after-sales. Any quality problems, just contact us, our experienced customer service team will respond in 24 hours ASAP. Enjoy a great shopping

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aheaplus Stylish 13-compartments Geometric Bookshelf, eye-catching and functional, this bookcase is a great addition to nearly any space. Great ideal for storing and showcasing books, favorite collections, potted plants, and more. Vintage Display Shelf for Living Room, Bedroom and Study Room.
Round Corners, No Hurt Thickened Wood Boards Anti-toppling Wall Bracket

Features: 1.Practical and Versatile Bookcase, great space-saving bookshelf and helps to keep your room neat. 2.Doubles as a bookshelf or room divider with an open-back design. 3.Anti-Falling Accessory included preventing injury from unexpected tipping of furniture, with an anti-tip kit to attach it to the wall, this bookcase offers a feeling of security, keeping both your books and you in good hands. 4.Round corners to prevent bumps, no hurts and nor afraid of children getting hits . 5.13-compartments, provides ample space for placing and organizing your books, plants, collections, knick-knacks and so on.

Specifications: Color: Rustic Brown Product Size: 33.9”L x 9.8”W x 55.1”H Max. Capacity per Compartment: 30 lb Max. Capacity Total: 250 lb Package Contents: 1 * Bookshelf 1 * Anti-Tip Kit 1 * Assembly Kit 1 * Instructions Notes: 1.Children are not allowed to climb on the product or play with it. 2.For safety reasons, please secure the product to the wall with the included anti-tip kit. 3.Put the screws in loosely until all pieces are together and then tighten them all. It will save your time if you make a mistake when installing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: The aesthetic and size of the bookshelf is great.It is a little wobbly on carpet but ones it's been loaded from the bottom, it seems to be pretty solid. It also comes with two small wall mounts for extra sturdiness, but have not needed it so far.Putting it together was simple enough and come with small tools Incase you don't have any, although I preferred to use my own.Overall a solid purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Second time is a charm…
reviews.reviewText: Both times this item was delivered the boxes were damaged.. it was returned quickly.. they were great to work with.. second time it was still damaged but we were able to paint and hide the imperfections. It looks great in the room we placed it in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy build, quality lacking
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy build, looks great as a whole, and very sturdy once everything is together. Unfortunately, it has some quality issues. Several dents, scratches, damaged corners, and uneven connections. Mine was also short one bolt, but luckily I happened to have one from another build that was the right size.A couple of build tips:1. Keep in mind you’re building the shelf face down. The instructions will label the side shelves as left and right, and that might confuse you if you think you’re building it face up.2. While the final build is quite sturdy, the pieces are just particle board, so don’t screw the bolts too tight or you’ll crack it.3. Instead of using the included wall anchors and putting holes in your drywall, just use wall hanging adhesive strips. The weight is well distributed, and it’s not that big, so adhesive strips should be more than enough to keep it in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my home office, size listed is bigger than what it really is. Hardware is cheap doesn’t line up properly. Purchased due to Amazon recommendation. Wish I had spent a little more and got something that was better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It's a little shorter than I expected, but it works. Fairly simple to put together. I like the design, more interesting than just a set of straight shelves. Looks good in my office.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a piece of junk
reviews.reviewText: I could not even assemble this thing. The screws have dull ends, so they can't be screwed in, and the holes are so shallow that the screws cannot go into them. You'd have to drill the holes deeper to get the screws in, and even then, you couldn't screw them in because they can't penetrate the wood, being dull and all. Waste of money. Non-functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy assemble, looks great!! I love it
